name.zh: 儿童格纹印花双肩书包（多花型）

description.en: A compact kids backpack featuring a classic checkered (gingham) pattern and school-ready layout. Includes a roomy main compartment, front zip pocket, and comfortable shoulder straps. OEM/ODM customization available for prints, fabric (including recycled options), colorways, logo patch, lining, pocket layout, and packaging.
description.zh: 儿童格纹印花双肩书包，经典格纹（Gingham）风格，适合上学与日常。主仓容量充足，前置拉链袋便于收纳，肩带背负更舒适。支持 OEM/ODM 定制：花型印花、面料（可选再生环保材料）、配色、Logo 工艺、内里、口袋结构与包装等。

en: Outer: Polyester / Nylon (customizable; recycled options available)
Zipper: Standard zipper or YKK optional
Padding: Foam/EVA padding for straps & back panel (customizable)
Logo: Woven label / rubber patch / embroidery (customizable)
zh: 面料：涤纶/尼龙（可定制；可选再生环保材料）
花型：色织格/数码印花（可定制）
拉链：常规拉链或可选 YKK
背负：肩带/背部可加海绵/EVA 衬垫（可定制）

en.Compartments: 1 main compartment + front zip pocket + internal sleeve (optional)
en.Customization: Prints, fabric, color, logo, lining, pocket layout, zipper & hardware, packaging

zh.收纳结构: 1 主仓 + 前拉链袋 + 内部夹层（可选）
zh.可定制: 花型印花、面料配色、Logo、内里、口袋结构、拉链五金、包装
